head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JOHNSTON, EDNITA B. (NEE DEPASS)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JOHNSTON, EDNITA B. (NEE DEPASS)

block.p: JOHNSTON-Ednita B. (nee DePass). Of Jamaica, NY, on October 6, 2000. Beloved mother of Dr. Phyllis (Johnston) Simon of Laurel Hollow, NY, and Richard Johnston, P.I., of Jamaica, NY. Loving sister of Juan (Johnny) DePass of Port Charlotte, FL. Beloved grandmother of Thomas, Stephen and Robert Simon and loving greatgrandmother of Dawn, Alec and Richard. Reposing at J. Foster Phillips Funeral Home, 179-24 Linden Blvd., Jamaica, NY, (718526-5656), where family will receive friends between 4-8 PM on Monday, October 9. A funeral service will be held at 5 PM. Interment will occur at 11 AM, Tuesday, October 10, at Pinelawn Cemetery in Melville.
